response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled value. Given its unique features and quality, I believe it's worth more than $8,000 to you. To ensure we're on the same page about its true worth, I propose an offer of $12,000 for the product. I trust this price reflects its immense value and potential benefits for you. Let me know if you're interested in discussing further or exploring any other options.", "product_price": 12000}
